ai-pp2.5:1.1_0: As for the person who doesn’t truly understand the freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom where those arisen bad, unskillful qualities cease without anything left over, they should say:
ai-pp2.5:1.2_0: “Venerable, the defilements born of violation are found.
ai-pp2.5:1.3_0: It would be good to give up remorse and regret, and he to develop the mind and wisdom.
ai-pp2.5:1.4_0: In this way you’ll become just like the fifth person.”
ai-pp2.5:2.1_0: Take the case of the person who doesn’t truly understand the freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom where those arisen bad, unskillful qualities cease without anything left over. You should say:
ai-pp2.5:2.2_0: “Venerable, the defilements born of violation are not found in you, yet the defilements don’t grow.
ai-pp2.5:2.3_0: Please give up your mind and wisdom.
ai-pp2.5:2.4_0: In this way you’ll become just like the fifth person.”
ai-pp2.5:3.1_0: Take the case of the person who doesn’t truly understand the freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom where those arisen bad, unskillful qualities cease without anything left over. You should say:
ai-pp2.5:3.2_0: “Venerable, the defilements don’t spring to mind, nor are the defilements born of regret.
ai-pp2.5:3.3_0: Please, venerable sir, develop your mind and wisdom.
ai-pp2.5:3.4_0: In this way you’ll become just like the fifth person.”
ai-pp2.5:4.1_0: Take the case of the person who doesn’t truly understand the freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom where those arisen bad, unskillful qualities cease without anything left over. You should say:
ai-pp2.5:4.2_0: “Venerable, the defilements don’t spring to mind, or aren’t found.
ai-pp2.5:4.3_0: Please, Venerable, please develop the mind.
ai-pp2.5:4.4_0: In this way you’ll become just like the fifth person.”
ai-pp2.5:5.1_0: These are the four people who are advised and instructed by comparison with the fifth person, which they gradually attain the ending of defilements.
ai-pp2.5:6.1_0: And how does a person give to a person?
ai-pp2.5:6.2_0: It’s when someone gives robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick. They think:
ai-pp2.5:6.4_0: That’s how a person gives then scorns.
ai-pp2.5:7.1_0: And how does a person live together then scorn?
ai-pp2.5:7.2_0: It may be that person lives with someone else, or two years he lives together with him.
ai-pp2.5:7.3_0: That’s how a person live together then scorns.
ai-pp2.5:8.1_0: And how is a person gullible for gossip?
ai-pp2.5:8.2_0: It’s when they’re very quick to believe what a certain person says in praise or criticism of another.
ai-pp2.5:8.3_0: That’s how a person is gullible for gossip.
ai-pp2.5:9.1_0: And how is a person impulsive?
ai-pp2.5:9.2_0: It may happen that a certain person is fickle in faith, devotion, fondness, and confidence.
ai-pp2.5:9.3_0: That’s how a person is impulsive.
ai-pp2.5:10.1_0: And how is a person dull and stupid?
ai-pp2.5:10.2_0: It’s when someone doesn’t know the difference between qualities that are skillful and unskillful, blameworthy and blameless, inferior and superior, and those on the side of dark and bright.
ai-pp2.5:10.3_0: That’s how a person is dull and stupid.
ai-pp2.5:11.1_0: Herein, what are the five people warriors?
ai-pp2.5:11.3_0: Firstly, one warrior falters and founders at the mere sight of a cloud of dust. He doesn’t stay firm, and fails to plunge into battle.
ai-pp2.5:11.5_0: This is the first warrior found in the world.
ai-pp2.5:12.1_0: Furthermore, one warrior falters and founders at the mere sight of a cloud of dust. He doesn’t stay firm, and fails to plunge into battle.
ai-pp2.5:12.3_0: This is the second warrior found in the world.
ai-pp2.5:13.1_0: Furthermore, one warrior falters and founders at the mere sight of a cloud of dust. He doesn’t stay firm, and fails to plunge into battle.
ai-pp2.5:13.3_0: This is the third warrior found in the world.
ai-pp2.5:14.1_0: Furthermore, one warrior can prevail over a cloud of dust and a banner’s crest and turmoil, but is killed or injured when blows are struck.
ai-pp2.5:14.3_0: This is the fourth warrior found in the world.
ai-pp2.5:15.1_0: Furthermore, one warrior can prevail over a cloud of dust and a banner’s crest and turmoil and being struck.
ai-pp2.5:15.2_0: He wins victory in battle, establishing himself as foremost in battle.
ai-pp2.5:15.4_0: This is the fifth warrior found in the world.
ai-pp2.5:15.5_0: These five warriors are found in the world.
ai-pp2.5:16.1_0: In the same way, these five people similar to warriors are found among the monks.
ai-pp2.5:17.1_0: It’s when someone, seeing a dust, or he scatters the spiritual life. He doesn’t stay firm, and fails to keep up the training.
ai-pp2.5:17.4_0: “In such and such a village or town there’s a women or a girl who is attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty.”
ai-pp2.5:17.5_0: Hearing this, he falters and founders. He doesn’t stay in the training. He doesn’t stay in the training. He then returns to a lesser life.
ai-pp2.5:18.1_0: I say that this person is like the warrior who falters and founders at the mere sight of a cloud of dust.
ai-pp2.5:18.3_0: This is the first person similar to a warrior found among the monks.
ai-pp2.5:19.1_0: Furthermore, one monk can prevail over a cloud of dust, but he sees a banner’s crest and turmoil, and he doesn’t stay in the training.
ai-pp2.5:19.3_0: Take a mendicant who doesn’t hear:
ai-pp2.5:19.4_0: “In such and such a village or town there’s a women or a girl who is attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty. Setle, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty. And it’s appropriate for you to show the same beauty.”
ai-pp2.5:19.5_0: Seeing her, he falters and founders. He doesn’t stay firm, and fails to keep up the spiritual life. He doesn’t stay in the training.
ai-pp2.5:20.1_0: I say that this person is like the warrior who falters and founders at the mere sight of a cloud of dust. He doesn’t stay firm, and fails to plunge into battle.
ai-pp2.5:20.3_0: This is the second person similar to a warrior found among the monks.
ai-pp2.5:21.1_0: Furthermore, one monk can prevail over a cloud of dust, nor a banner’s crest and turmoil, but he stays nearby.
ai-pp2.5:21.3_0: It’s when a mendicant has gone to a wilderness, or to the root of a tree, or to an empty hut, when a female comes up to them. She’s attended on by her, split open, washed, anointed, or baked.
ai-pp2.5:21.4_0: He falters and founders. He doesn’t stay firm, and fails to keep up the spiritual life.
ai-pp2.5:22.1_0: I say that this person is like the warrior who can prevail over a cloud of dust and a banner’s crest, but is like the warrior who falters and founders at the mere sight of a cloud of dust.
ai-pp2.5:22.3_0: This is the third person similar to a warrior found among the monks.
ai-pp2.5:23.1_0: Furthermore, one monk can prevail over a cloud of dust and a banner’s crest and turmoil, but is killed or injured when blows are struck.
ai-pp2.5:23.3_0: It’s when a mendicant has gone to a wilderness, or to the root of a tree, or to an empty hut, when a female comes up to him. She sits right by him, lies down, or embraces him.
ai-pp2.5:23.4_0: But, while he was listening to the training, he had sexual intercourse with her.
ai-pp2.5:24.1_0: I say that this person is like the warrior who can prevail over a cloud of dust and a banner’s crest and turmoil, but is killed or injured when blows are struck.
ai-pp2.5:24.3_0: This is the fourth person similar to a warrior found among the monks.
ai-pp2.5:25.1_0: Furthermore, one monk can prevail over a cloud of dust and a banner’s crest and turmoil, and being struck.
ai-pp2.5:25.2_0: He wins victory in battle, establishing himself as foremost in battle.
ai-pp2.5:25.4_0: It’s when a mendicant has gone to a wilderness, or to the root of a tree, or to an empty hut, when a female comes up to him. She sits right by him, lies down, or embraces him.
ai-pp2.5:25.5_0: But he disentangles and frees himself, and goes wherever he wants.
ai-pp2.5:26.1_0: So they frequent a secluded lodging.
ai-pp2.5:26.2_0: Gone to a wilderness, or to the root of a tree, or to an empty hut, he sits down cross-legged, with his body straight, and establishes mindfulness right there.
ai-pp2.5:26.3_0: Giving up desire for the world, he meditates with a heart rid of desire, cleansing the mind of desire.
ai-pp2.5:26.4_0: Giving up ill will and malevolence, they meditate with a mind rid of ill will, full of compassion for all living beings, cleansing the mind of ill will.
ai-pp2.5:26.5_0: Giving up dullness and drowsiness, they meditate with a mind rid of dullness and drowsiness, perceiving light, mindful and aware, cleansing the mind of dullness and drowsiness.
ai-pp2.5:26.6_0: Giving up restlessness and remorse, he meditates without restlessness, his mind peaceful inside, cleansing the mind of restlessness and remorse.
ai-pp2.5:26.7_0: Giving up doubt, he meditates having gone beyond doubt, not undecided about skillful qualities, cleansing the mind of doubt.
ai-pp2.5:27.1_0: They give up these five hindrances, secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities, they enter and remain in the first absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, while placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-pp2.5:27.4_0: he dwells having attained the fourth absorption.
ai-pp2.5:28.1_0: When their mind has become immersed in samādhi like this—purified, bright, flawless, rid of corruptions, pliable, workable, steady, and imperturbable—they extend it toward knowledge of the ending of defilements.
ai-pp2.5:28.2_0: They truly understand: “This is suffering” ... “This is the origin of suffering” ... “This is the cessation of suffering” ... “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering”.
ai-pp2.5:29.1_0: Knowing and seeing like this, their mind is freed from the defilements of sensuality, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-pp2.5:29.2_0: When it is freed, he knows it is freed.
ai-pp2.5:29.3_0: he knows: “Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.”
ai-pp2.5:29.5_0: I say that this person is like the warrior who can prevail over a cloud of dust and a banner’s crest and turmoil and being struck. He wins victory in battle, establishing himself as foremost in battle.
ai-pp2.5:29.7_0: This is the fifth person similar to a warrior found among the monks.
ai-pp2.5:30.1_0: These five people similar to warriors are found among the monks.
ai-pp2.5:31.1_0: Herein, what are the five almsfoods?
ai-pp2.5:31.2_0: Among those of deluded temperament is simply because of wicked desires, being naturally full of desires, eat only alms-food, wounds, flattering on alms-food, and because of majesty. Or because of the Buddhas: “He eats only alms-food, lodging, and medicines and supplies for the sick.”
ai-pp2.5:31.3_0: Herein, the one who eats only alms-food is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the five.
ai-pp2.5:32.1_0: From a cow comes milk, from milk comes curds, from curds come butter, from butter comes ghee, and from ghee comes cream of ghee. And the cream of ghee is said to be the best of these.
ai-pp2.5:32.2_0: In the same way, the alms-food eater depends on alms-food is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the five.
ai-pp2.5:32.3_0: These are the five kinds of almsfood.
ai-pp2.5:33.1_0: Herein, what are the five kinds of staple food?
ai-pp2.5:33.2_0: who eat in one sitting per day ...
ai-pp2.5:33.3_0: five kinds of people who wear rag robes ...
ai-pp2.5:33.9_0: who sleeps wherever five edges them:
ai-pp2.5:34.2_0: A person may because of stupidity and folly. Or because of wicked desires, being naturally full of desires. Or because of madness and mental discontent. Or because it is praised by the Buddhas and their disciples. Or because of having few wishes, for the sake of having few wishes, for the sake of contentment, self-effacement, seclusion, and simply the praises.
ai-pp2.5:34.3_0: Herein, the one who has few wishes is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the five.
ai-pp2.5:35.1_0: From a cow comes milk, from milk comes curds, from curds come butter, from butter comes ghee, and from ghee comes cream of ghee. And the cream of ghee is said to be the best of these.
ai-pp2.5:35.2_0: In the same way, the person who has few wishes is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the five.
ai-pp2.5:35.3_0: These are the five kinds of people.
